creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2002-1060
is 10 years old XSS vulnerability on an error handling page in some products running on devices with CacheOS.

It is not related to Tomcat.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: The user account that created this spam issue has been disabled.
